input.comstyle-input{display:block;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;font-family:console,monospace;border:none;outline:0;font-size:.85rem;padding:0;margin:0;color:#eaeaea;overflow:hidden;background:#111}div.comstyle-input-holder div.comstyle-input #333}.t-normal{font-size:.9rem;font-weight:400}.t-small{font-size:.8rem;font-weight:300}.t-medium{font-size:1rem;font-weight:500}.t-large{font-size:1.1rem;font-weight:600}.t-console{font-size:.8rem;line-height:.8rem;font-family:console,monospace}.small-icon-button{position:relative;display:inline-block;font-size:.8rem;color:#eaeaea;padding:.1rem .4rem;margin:0;cursor:default}.small-icon-button:hover{color:#979797}.small-button{position:relative;display:inline-block;font-size:.8rem;color:#eaeaea;padding:.25rem .4rem;margin:.25rem;cursor:default;background-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#555,#5f5f5f);box-sizing:border-box;border:thin outset #555;border-radius:2px}.small-button:hover{color:#fff;background-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#5f5f5f,#555)}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:8px;height:8px;background-color:#333}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{border-radius:0;background-color:#555}::-webkit-scrollbar-corner{background-color:#333}p.row span{font-family:console,monospace;font-size:13.5px;font-variant-numeric:tabular-nums;padding:0;margin:0;line-height:16px;height:16px;max-height:16px;white-space:pre;vertical-align:top}p.row span.match{background:silver;color:#333;font-weight:600}:host{position:absolute;display:block;top:.5rem;left:.5rem;right:.5rem;bottom:.5rem;overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:auto}:host span.spliter{position:relative;display:block;width:100%;height:.5rem}:host p.info{color:#979797}:host div.wrapper span.name{position:relative;display:inline-block;min-width:5rem}:host div.wrapper div.progress{position:relative;height:.5rem;width:5rem;margin:0 auto}:host div.aling-right{text-align:right}:host div.aling-right .small-button:last-child{margin-right:0}
